text: Hi everyone ! Our technical team is working on redesigning our platform and would like to change the chat logo design. We haven't found any documentation on this. Is there any custom code that we can use ?
Yeah I would, a lot more flexible than Marketplace. Plus you get more than the 50 modules limit that the marketplace has

I'm using "react-HubSpot-form" to add a lead generation form on a site.

But autofill does not work. I've tried to pass it as a prop to the component, but it doesn't insert anything. I would rather not use localstorage, but I guess that's an option.

Also, I thought the HubSpot tracking cookie working with the HubSpot form would fill in user info, but that's not the case. This is an inline form not in an iframe so maybe that is the difference.

Any thoughts?
